ai.summary: Havant Footpath 35 is a very short, easy hike in the UK, covering about 0.4 km. It’s suitable for beginners, families, and anyone looking for a quick, low-effort walk.
ai.terrain_summary: The route is a flat, well-marked footpath with surfaces consisting mostly of paved or compact gravel. Elevation change is minimal, providing easy footing for most walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather conditions before you go. Wear comfortable, sturdy shoes and bring a light layer and some water. If the path passes through urban areas, stay aware of other pedestrians and cyclists, and use any crossings or sidewalks where provided. Plan for daylight hours and carry a mobile phone for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Sunscreen and hat in sunny weather
ai.best_seasons: All year round in the UK, with spring and summer offering the most comfortable conditions for outdoor walking.

seo.title: Havant Footpath 35 – Easy 0.4 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Havant Footpath 35, a quick and easy 0.4 km hike in the UK. Flat terrain, simple route, safety tips, and packing list for a family-friendly stroll.
